item.title: GTT Expands Ethernet Footprint With PacketExchange
item.description:
GTT, a global telecommunications company, is expanding its Ethernet services globally by acquiring PacketExchange, an Ethernet provider. PacketExchange, based in London, boasts a substantial 10 Gigabit fiber optic IP network spanning Europe, the United States, and Asia, largely acquired through its acquisition of MZIMA Networks in 2010. This combined infrastructure offers private line services, MPLS, VPLS networking, and peering capabilities. This acquisition highlights the growing dominance of Carrier Ethernet in telecommunications...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/gtt-expands-ethernet-footprint-with-packetexchange/
